title: Episode 121 w/ Tony Rock, Ras Kass, Charlie Mack and D-dot Angelettie (Part 2)
itunes:title: Episode 121 w/ Tony Rock, Ras Kass, Charlie Mack and D-dot Angelettie (Part 2)
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this part two of two episode the guys talk with Tony Rock, Ras Kass, Charlie Mack and Deric D-Dot Angelettie aka the Madd Rapper. The guys debate ghost writing in hip hop, the difference between MC's and rappers, and a lot more. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
